sentences.sContent: Organic food is now widely available.
sentences.sCn: 现在有机食品很多地方都可买到。

sentences.sContent: an author who had travelled widely in East Asia
sentences.sCn: 曾游历东亚各地的一位作家

sentences.sContent: These laws were widely regarded as too strict.
sentences.sCn: 人们普遍认为这些法令太苛刻。

sentences.sContent: This view was not widely held.

words.tran: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
普遍的，广泛的；分布广的

trans.tranOther: in a lot of different places or by a lot of people
